sourcesContent:
// components/ReviewPanel.js (with Add More button on last screen) import React from "react"; export default function ReviewPanel({ cart, vehicleName, vehicleNumber, notes, onPrint, onSendWhatsapp, onAddMore }) { const totalCTN = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.entries.reduce((eSum, e) => eSum + (e.ctn || 0), 0), 0); return (
{/* Final Review Header */}

📋 Order Review

{/* Order Summary List (screen only) */}
{cart.map((item, i) => (

{item.name}

{/* ✅ New column */} {item.entries.map((entry, idx) => ( ))}
Batch Qty CTN Total Qty
{entry.batch} {entry.qty} {entry.ctn} {(entry.qty || 0) * (entry.ctn || 0)}
))} {/* Dealer + Vehicle Info */}

🚛 Vehicle: {vehicleName}

🔢 Vehicle Number: {vehicleNumber}

📦 Total CTNs: {totalCTN}

{notes &&

📝 Notes: {notes}

}

🗓 Date: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

{/* Action Buttons */}
{/* Print Version Only Table */}

🏭 Factory to Warehouse Order

{cart.flatMap((item, itemIndex) => item.entries.map((entry, batchIndex) => ( )) )}
Product Batch MFG EXP Qty/CTN CTN Total Qty
{item.name} {entry.batch} {entry.mfg} {entry.exp} {entry.qty} {entry.ctn} {(entry.qty || 0) * (entry.ctn || 0)}

🚛 Vehicle: {vehicleName} – {vehicleNumber}

{notes &&

📝 Notes: {notes}

}

📦 Total CTNs: {totalCTN}

🗓 Date: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

📌 Printed by Jai Ayurved

); }
